text.tspan: Prevalence of stunting vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Prevalence of stunting is the percentage of children under age 5 whose height for age is more than two standard
deviations below the median for the international reference population ages 0-59 months. GDP per capita is
Data source: Institute for Health Metrics & Evaluation (IHME); World Bank
